content:
Sure, here's the shortened article with in-text citations and IEEE reference style references:

Zomato is an online restaurant discovery and food delivery platform available in over 25 countries worldwide [1]. The platform offers a variety of services for both customers and restaurant owners, including an extensive database of restaurants, ratings and reviews, online ordering, and table reservations. Zomato's restaurant content management system collects and aggregates data from multiple sources, providing users with a comprehensive database of dining establishments worldwide [1].

One of the most popular features of Zomato is its rating and review system. This system allows users to share their experiences and opinions on restaurants they have visited, providing a comprehensive and accurate picture of each establishment [2]. Restaurants with high ratings and positive reviews are featured prominently on the platform, making them more visible to potential customers.
